blogPost.excerpt: Zyla is the fastest end-to-end headless commerce stack that blends cutting-edge content management and commerce tools that can accept payments and ship worldwide instantly once deployed to Vercel.
blogPost.body: Zyla is the fastest end-to-end headless commerce stack that blends cutting-edge content management and commerce tools that can accept payments and ship worldwide instantly once deployed to Vercel.
blogPost.title: Zyla - The fastest headless commerce stack on earth ⚡
blogPost.author: surgieboi

localize.description: Zyla是最快的端到端无头商务堆栈，它融合了最先进的内容管理和商务工具，一旦部署到Vercel，就可以接受支付并立即向全球发货。
localize.tagline: 地球上最快的无头商业堆栈 ⚡ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇

localize.description: Zyla是最快的端到端無頭商務堆棧，它融合了最先進的內容管理和商務工具，一旦部署到Vercel，就可以接受支付並立即向全球發貨。
localize.tagline: 地球上最快的無頭商業堆棧 ⚡ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇

previous.excerpt: Find the most converting headline on your landing site with Juggler! It is an intuitive and straightforward A/B testing tool for your site and it's fully online. Just add the lightweight script on your site and you are ready to find the best headline!
previous.title: Juggler.dev - The easiest way to proceed A/B testing on your site

localize.description: 用Juggler在你的登陆网站上找到最具转化率的标题! 它是一个直观直接的A/B测试工具，为您的网站，它是完全在线的。只需在您的网站上添加轻量级脚本，您就可以找到最好的标题了!
localize.tagline: 在您的网站上进行A/B测试的最简单方法。

localize.description: 用Juggler在你的登陸網站上找到最具轉化率的標題! 它是一個直觀直接的A/B測試工具，爲您的網站，它是完全在線的。只需在您的網站上添加輕量級腳本，您就可以找到最好的標題了!
localize.tagline: 在您的網站上進行A/B測試的最簡單方法。

next.excerpt: Macro helps teams supercharge their manual and repetitive processes. Our powerful checklist allows teams to quickly document processes, assign tasks, track progress, and automate common actions.
next.title: Macro - Supercharge your team’s processes

localize.description: Macro帮助团队超额完成人工和重复性流程。我们强大的核对表使团队能够快速记录流程、分配任务、跟踪进度，并将常见的操作自动化。
localize.tagline: 为您的团队流程注入活力

localize.description: Macro幫助團隊超額完成人工和重複性流程。我們強大的核對錶使團隊能夠快速記錄流程、分配任務、跟蹤進度，並將常見的操作自動化。
localize.tagline: 爲您的團隊流程注入活力
